name: E.X. Troopers
description:
A new type of exhilarating comic action game from Capcom! Play as the main character, Bren, and fight with the friends you meet at school against the hostile snow pirates and the aboriginal creature Akrid!

You can also enjoy cooperative play that allows up to 3 people to participate in local communication, and competitive play that allows up to 6 people to participate!
